snippet: Ms. Fiorina rode the wave of good first impressions she had made in the undercard debate of Republican presidential candidates in Cleveland into a packed conference of conservatives.
abstract: Ms. Fiorina rode the wave of good first impressions she had made in the undercard debate of Republican presidential candidates in Cleveland into a packed conference of conservatives.

headline.main: Day After Debates, Carly Fiorina Finds Receptive Audience
